about:
Motivated Data Analyst with the technical expertise and business acumen necessary to translate business requirements and objectives into scalable, highly resilient and successful system solutions.


 Strong communicator with experience presenting complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, also Business graduate professional working as a sales consultant with Shaw Communications Inc. and passionate about helping businesses succeed. 

 Personally, I love reading books, travelling and music. These interests have helped me to gain different perspective and enabled me to thrive in various environment.
